Configuration GUI redesign. Main dialog has no configuration tabs and shows some status information only together with the most important functions (database update/reset, server start/stop and quit). The configuration dialogs are separate modal dialog windows now. This makes it easier to add options to individual settings pages without affection overall layout. Also adding new pages is easier and does not make the number of tabs even bigger. The individual dialogs are resizable and the positions and sizes are saved in the settings which makes the dialogs configuration much better.
